How many people are affected by tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome ?,"TRAPS has an estimated prevalence of one per million individuals; it is the second most common inherited recurrent fever syndrome, following a similar condition called familial Mediterranean fever. More than 1,000 people worldwide have been diagnosed with TRAPS.",GHR,tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome
